professionalSummary: Passionate Full Stack Developer with 2 years of intensive experience and recent Information Technology graduate from Bangkok University (2023), specializing in modern web development and AI automation. Currently at ExelitPro, I create custom web applications for each client's specific needs using Next.js, Strapi CMS, and cutting-edge AI tools to deliver intelligent, personalized solutions. From crafting responsive React.js interfaces to developing robust APIs and implementing AI workflows, I bring innovative technology solutions to life. I specialize in LLM deployment using Docker model runners for testing and optimization, AI-powered image generation with ComfyUI workflows, and building intelligent automation systems with N8N that revolutionize user interactions through automated task processing and smart responses. With strong proficiency in JavaScript, TypeScript, and emerging AI technologies, I consistently deliver next-generation solutions while collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams. Passionate about pioneering the future of web development through artificial intelligence integration.
